channel.title: Noodles on Studentcooking
channel.description: Recent content in Noodles on Studentcooking

item.title: Tuna Corn Noodles
item.description: Ingredients: Noodles canned Tuna canned Corn Spices: mustard   Inctructions: Cook your Noodles drain the oil from the Tuna in the Pan start frying in order: Noodles Tuna Corn add some Mustard I like it if everything has a nice litte char serve with some Parmesan(because more cheese always wins) Indescribable:

item.title: Steak Noodles
item.description: Ingredients: Noodles marinated BBQ Steak Onion Garlic Cream Cream Cheese Spices: Pepper   Inctructions: some time before: freeze the Steak cook your Noodles cut up Onion and Garlic, Steak(cuts better a little frozen) with some Olive Oil start frying in order: Steak Noodles Onion after everything is fried to your taste add some Cream and Cream Cheese, ceason with some additional Pepper keep it on low heat until you have no liquid left and Cream coaded Noodles serve with some Parmesan(because more cheese always wins) Indescribable:

item.title: Paprika Chicken Noodles
item.description: Ingredients: Noodles Chicken Paprika Scallions Cream Cheese Cream Olive Oil Spices: Paprika Pepper Salt Garlic Soja Sauce Sriracha   Inctructions: some hours before: marinate the chicken cook your Noodles cut up Paprika and Scallions with some Olive Oil start frying in order: Chicken Noodles Paprika and Scallions after everything is fried to your taste add some Cream and Cream Cheese, ceason with some additional Salt and Pepper keep it on low heat until you have no liquid left and Cream coaded Noodles Indescribable:
